title: Vicar Daniel French asks "Could an Underground Church Emerge in the UK?"
description:
Daniel was a small church Vicar who randomly responded to a journalist's tweet. That journalist responded immediately asking for 800 words on his perspective. One article became a second and now he's sharing some of what he thinks with a broader audience. Here is his story. 

He intersects with many this channel is talking about: Jonathan Pageau, Jordan Peterson, Rod Dreher and Tom Holland. 

https://www.spectator.co.uk/article/could-an-underground-church-now-emerge-in-britain-

https://www.spectator.co.uk/article/welby-s-bid-to-placate-statue-topplers-could-backfire

Notes
raised by paternal grandparents

Frog marched

Profound conversion experience at 17. Found grandfather passed away, felt he was being held
Started reading the bible properly
Grandma was RC, Granddad was Anglican, Confirmed into the RC church and went to seminary
Met wife. Got married. 
Rod Dreher

Salcolme UK, Sailing capital of the UK. 

Had been watching Jonathan Pageau, had an interest in Icon writing
Amazing insights into symbolism
His stuff on Genesis
From Pageau to Me to JBP
Great constituency of post-atheists
Marketing
Tom Holland
Why is the COE trying to become like the liberal democrat party
Most CoE are conservative in their outlook while the clergy is more progressive
It's as if the vicar on Sunday morning is telling us off…
Liberation theology, began very enthusiastic, the more he read…
Liberation theology was dividing the world into them and us. Lots of Moses but not enough Jesus
Can I divide the world up in this way without disrespecting that first bit of scripture "love your enemies"
The gospel has to be about love rather than a claim for power. 
CS Lewis

Frasier Nelson, the courage to engage with the world to reboot things. 
Rod Dreher, Alistair McIntyre After Virtue

New Monasticism, none of that McIntyre vision 
Shawn King, White Jesus, Statues

Justin Brierley Tom Holland
Courage provider

Pro-life, product of a teenage pregnancy

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
